{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = 3Com_AirConnect_3CRWE737A |wikipedia = |brand = 3Com |model = AirConnect 3CRWE737A |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/22/2009 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/3Com_AirConnect_3CRWE737A |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 0101 |device_id = 0001 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = "3Com", "3CRWE737A AirConnect Wireless LAN PC Card", "1.00", "" |windosid = |fcc_id = DF63CRWE73796, H9PLA4121, H9PLA4111 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:50:DA |chip1 = Symbol;; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861B; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MMCX |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/23/2001 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 662705307046 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00004Z8M6 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== These cards may be a mix of [[Symbol LA-4121]] and [[Symbol LA-4111]]. [http://djbnetbsd.drivehq.com/PC/NetBSD/PRISM/models.html On djb's PRISM models page] ([https://deviwiki.com/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/PRISM%20Models.html archived here]) Known sub-models / revisions include... *3CRWE737A rev A (w/ MMCX connectors) - LA-4111 **FCC ID: H9PLA4111, OUI: 00:05:DA *3CRWE737A-JP rev A (w/ MMCX connectors) - LA-4111 **No FCC ID (used outside of USA) *3CRWE737A rev B (w/ MMCX connectors) - LA-4111 **FCC ID: H9PLA4111, OUI: 00:05:DA *Symbol-labeled LA-4111-1000-3COM (w/ MMCX connectors) - LA-4111 **No FCC ID (used outside of USA) *3CRWE737 96B rev A (integral antenna) - LA-4121 **FCC ID: DF63CRWE73796, OUI: 00:05:DA **Top card label indicates 'Version 2.0', concatenated model of 3CRWE73796B All of the aforementioned cards procvide the same output, as seen below, using '''pccardctl ident'''... 
Socket 0:
  product info: "3Com
", "3CRWE737A AirConnect Wireless LAN PC Card
", "1.00
", ""
  manfid: 0x0101, 0x0001
  function: 6 (network)
==See also== *[[3Com AirConnect 3CRWE62092A|3Com 3CRWE62092A]] - PCMCIA (NWN) uses poldhu_cs driver *[[3Com 3CRWE62092B]] - PCMCIA (Atmel) works with pcmf502r3 Atmel driver *3Com 3CRWE737A - PCMCIA (Symbol) works with Orinoco driver *[[3Com AirConnect 3CRWE73796|3Com 3CRWE73796]] (B) - PCMCIA (Symbol) works with Orinoco driver *[[3Com 3CRWE747A rev B|3Com 3CRWE747A]] (B) - PCMCIA (Symbol) AirConnect AP *[[3Com AirConnect 3CRWE777A|3Com 3CRWE777A]] - PLX/PCI (Prism 2/2.5/3) Linux-wlan-ng *[[3Com AirConnect 3CRDW696 rev A|3Com 3CRDW696]] (A) - PCI (Prism 2/2.5/3) *[[3Com 3CRSHPW196]] - PCMCIA (Atmel) *[[3Com 3CRSHPW696]] - PCMCIA (Atmel) *[[3Com 3CRSHEW696]] - USB (Atmel) *[[3Com 3CRSHPW796]] - Cardbus (ADMtek) [[Category:English Documentation]]
